title: Galaxy Tab S8 Ultra From Samsung Is a Ginormous Tablet for Work and Play
sub_head: The company also introduced two other flashy tablets that come with a stylus and are compatible with laptop-style keyboard cases
body:
Forget laptops. How about a tablet with a 14-inch screen?
Samsung on Wednesday unveiled the $1,100 Galaxy Tab S8 Ultra. With a 14.6-inch OLED display, itâ€™s the biggest tablet on the market to use the high-contrast screen tech found mostly in premium smartphones. The South Korean electronics giant also showed off its $900 Tab S8+, with a 12.4-inch OLED display, and the $700 Tab S8, with an 11-inch LCD touch screen, along with its lineup of new Galaxy S22 smartphones.
